problem.markdown:

Answer: The bus was canceled so we waited for the next one. 2- The flight was canceled. The weather was terrible. = The flight was canceled because the weather was terrible. 3- The food was hot and spicy. We drank three bottles of water with our meal. = The food was hot and spicy so we drank three bottles of water with our meal. 4- The meeting was long and boring. The department head spoke for two hours! = The meeting was long and boring because the department head spoke for two hours! or= The meeting was long and boring because the department head spoke for two hours. 5- The restaurant didn't take credit cards. I paid with cash. = The restaurant didn't take credit cards so I paid with cash. or= The restaurant didn´t take credit cards so I paid with cash. or= The restaurant didn`t take credit cards so I paid with cash.
